<NEW>

There was a nod from Whe=
elie, "I find I must say, I would prefer to stay in the Ark this day.  For =
I fear what we will see when all away.  There may be another power at play,=
 here to come while we are out today.  I nkow that if we spread ourselves t=
o thin, someone could come here and the war they couyld win.  There is more=
 than we know going on, I do not like it, we do not belong.  I fear we may =
find something we do not know, and we shall not like to go."

At this point=
, nodding up over and readyign to go out in the portion of the grid wher eh=
te trio had been dispatched to patrol.  Not so much a sense of fear in him.=
.  But hesitation.
